pageContext.claim: “I authorized Zero access to White House (actually turned him down many times) for author of phony book! I never spoke to him for book.”
pageContext.analysis: Michael Wolff, the author of a critical account of Trump's first year, says he had three hours of interviews with Trump. The White House will only concede a 5 to 7- minute call with Trump. (Trump artfully says he had no conversation "for the book"). The White House also conceded that Wolff had regular access to the White House, especially to see aide Stephen Bannon, but says he did not have unfettered access.
